fr:frontmatter.fr:title: What's up with all these fancy optimizers?

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: Throughout my trials and tribulations with experimental RL, I ran into the seemingly prevelant problem of severe instability dependent on optimizers and even hyperparameters of optimizers. In this blog, I aim to understand where and why things have seemingly evolved out of control from trusty SGD.
